name: Magical Task
description:
Magical Task is a simple witch “simulator”, where you need to make potions to satisfy your customers. This game was developed during #jogabilijam3 by AwmDaher and JBrumano.

It has a simple mechanic based on 3 main actions: pick up the right ingredients, mix them in a hot cauldron and deliver to the customer before the time runs out.

To play you only need to use the mouse; drag to the cauldron the ingredients that the recipe want. After that, mix everything clicking the fastest possible in the cauldron. And to deliver the potion to the client, click on the coin before the time runs out!

Music theme "Fun" by TwTOfficial
Font "m5x7" by Daniel Linssen
